title: Sustainable Architecture and Computation-Integrated Smart Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Accessibility-focused smartphone-based design enabling core concept learning without complex software

learning_goals: Students can explain the three core principles of sustainable architecture: energy efficiency, resource conservation, and user-centered design.
Students can perform basic architectural modeling using parametric design tools via mobile apps.
Students can analyze BIM (Building Information Modeling)-based energy simulation results and propose design improvements.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
